pkgmetadata.longdescription: Population Fisher Information Matrix // Evaluate or optimize designs for nonlinear mixed effects models using the Fisher Information matrix. Methods used in the package refer to Mentr F, Mallet A, Baccar D (1997) doi:10.1093/biomet/84.2.429, Retout S, Comets E, Samson A, Mentr F (2007) doi:10.1002/sim.2910, Bazzoli C, Retout S, Mentr F (2009) doi:10.1002/sim.3573, Le Nagard H, Chao L, Tenaillon O (2011) doi:10.1186/1471-2148-11-326, Combes FP, Retout S, Frey N, Mentr F (2013) doi:10.1007/s11095-013-1079-3 and Seurat J, Tang Y, Mentr F, Nguyen TT (2021) doi:10.1016/j.cmpb.2021.106126.
